items.text: full and on the stumps, defended with an angled bat towards point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Silva, no run

items.text: That's a gonner! Ball nipped back in from offstump and struck Dhananjaya flush in front of the stumps. He's been given out immediately but goes for the review after a brief consultation with Kusal Perera. And the review confirms what the naked eye suggested - three big reds, and Sri Lanka have not just lost a batsman, but a review too.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to de Silva, OUT

dismissal.text: DM de Silva lbw b Mashrafe Mortaza 0 (3b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: defended carefully to the offside
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.preText: Atit: "What is the individual highest score by Bangladeshi batsman in ODI?" - It's 154 by Tamim Iqbal in this game. Incidentally, the same game in which Coventry made 194 not out.
items.text: full ball on off, driven to cover but with no timing
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: draws the edge but it falls well short of first slip. In the corridor and the batsman had a poke at it.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: straight back past the bowler Overpitched on the stumps and he shows the full face of the bat to drive it straight to the fence
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, FOUR runs

items.text: slashed hard but straight to point. there was a hint of a room outside off and the ball was back of a length. Perera's strong forearms come into play
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: patted into the leg-side and Perera wants a single but Mathews sends him back. Would have been a risky run, and Perera had to scramble back into his crease
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: good looking straight drive again, but this time straight to mid-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling into the batsman. Defended to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.preText: karan: "Srilanka have come a long long way from the giant they were in times of Murali, Jayasurya,Arvinda,Ranatunga..simply legends they were..Having said that I must admit the same for Bangla but in a positive sense though..they are no longer the minnows they used to be and can defeat any team on any given day!"
items.text: angling into him again, on the stumps and defended back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: full on off and driven, but Mortaza tumbles to his left to block the ball
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: back of a length on off and Mathews defends it into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: straighter, and Mathews moves across and taps it to the leg-side but can't get past mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: back of length outside off again, and defended again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: same ball, same result. Mathews is content to play watchfully, and with three wickets down, that's probably the right way
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.text: maiden over slower ball, full on the stumps and Mathews toe-ends his drive back to Mortaza
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mathews, no run

items.preText:
Mehidy Hasan into the attack. Round the wicket to the left-hander

Abhilash Munshi: "Any Indians feeling sympathy for srilankans? Rahim just did what Buttler and in particular Curran did to us in the last series after clearly being on top everytime to end their innings on a high and then comes the vulnerable top order... "
items.text: defended from the stumps
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: good length, given the ball some air, and Perera comes forward to defend again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: goes wider of the stumps to get an angle into Perera, who thinks about an aggressive shot but pats it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: solidly defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: takes a stride out and stroke it in the gap past cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to MDKJ Perera, 1 run

items.preText: Not much turn for Mehidy. Sri Lanka's spinners didn't get much either
items.text: tries to clip it past midwicket but doesn't get the timing or placement right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mathews, no run

items.preText: Ahamed: "@Karan very true, SLs decline has coincided with BAN ascendance. SL just havent backed the right players over the last four years and BAN have done the opposite. For example, one more wicket here and BAN are assured of a win..." - assured of a win might be too strong.
items.text: back of a length and angling into the batsman, he punches it to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to MDKJ Perera, no run

items.text: gets it to straighten faintly from offstump, but not enough to take the edge. Perera's jabs it down
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to MDKJ Perera, no run
